mapper.select: select * from member where id=#{id} and member_status='Y'
mapper.insert: insert into member values(#{id}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{phone}, #{address}, sysdate, sysdate, default)
mapper.update: update member set name=#{name}, nickname=#{nickName}, gender=#{gender}, age=#{age}, email=#{email}, phone=#{phone}, address=#{address}, update_date=sysdate where id=#{id}
